title: The Bass Red Triangle: The World's First Trademark
description: One-minute skill: The Bass Red Triangle: The World's First Trademark.

hook.text: On January 1, 1876, a brewery registered a red triangle. It became trademark #1 in the UK.

buildup.text: Bass Brewery needed to stop competitors from copying their label on pale ale bottles.

climax.text: Bass proved that a visual mark could be owned, defended, and worth millions.
